channel.title: Asteroid comet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the asteroid comet of the day.

item.title: Comet (browser)
item.description: Comet is an AI-powered web browser based on Chromium. It was released by Perplexity AI for Microsoft Windows and macOS on July 9, 2025, and for Android on November 20, 2025. Initial access to the browser was limited to users subscribed to Perplexity's most expensive tier, with broader availability expected over time. The browser was released for free download in October 2025.
